oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Welcoming Remarks
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Aronson, Carl E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is a pleasure and privilege for me to welcome each of you to the 4th Symposium on Veterinary Pharmacology & Therapeutics. When our organization was chartered back in 1977, one of its stated goals was to sponsor meetings and symposia relating to Veterinary Pharmacology & Therapeutics in order to provide a forum for us to meet to discuss items of interest and concern to our discipline am the veterinary profession.
